favourite.article:
Lord, before we were saved, we had panted before you. When we sought a cool spring, we have drank of it, Hallelujah, we have found Thee!!
You are the Very One who satisfied our thirst, the longings of our soul, our burning hunger within and you become our rich supply.
Hallelujah, we have found You!!

thanks you LOrd for everything that you've given us.You are our satisfaction.thank you Lord for giving me all your riches..through your life LOrd we are now save. Cause us LOrd to seek after you. you are our redeemer. And LOrd cause us to be hungry and thirsty before you.LOrd Jesus we Glorify your name . your name is abover all name.. Hallelujah!!!!!!!!!!!
